results.lead_paragraph: I NOTE with alarm the growing trend toward semantic games played by those responsible for the titling of TV series. If such double entendres as "Get Smart" (referring to agent Maxwell Smart) and now "Strange Report" (re sleuth Adam Strange) are allowed to persist, the unsuspecting viewer will then be forced to question the true nature of all listings on his television schedule.

headline.main: Interpex Souvenir

results.snippet: THE Bureau of Engraving and Printing, Washington, will sell an astronautical souvenir card at Interpex, the stamp show to be held at the Americana Hotel here on March 12-14. The card will utilize as its vignette a block of four in normal colors of...
results.lead_paragraph: THE Bureau of Engraving and Printing, Washington, will sell an astronautical souvenir card at Interpex, the stamp show to be held at the Americana Hotel here on March 12-14. The card will utilize as its vignette a block of four in normal colors of the design of the 4-cent Project Mercury stamp issued in 1962 on the afternoon of the day that Col. John R. Glenn made the first successful American flight into space.
